name: dorm
content:
dorm noun [C]
(ROOM)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large room containing many beds, for example in a boarding school: The hostel has single-sex dorms.
wakila/E+/GettyImages

dorm noun [C]
(BUILDING)
US (UK hall of residence) a large building at a college or university where students live: Smoking is not permitted in college dorms. My mom and I were buying things for my dorm room.
